summary: A three level noble apartment in the heart of Skyrim's capital.
descriptionHtml:
A three level, one bedroom apartment complete with kitchen, bathroom, alchemy, enchanting and full smithing. Located across from the Emperor's tower, The apartment is in a high end district of the city.  Tastefully appointed with noble furniture, its the perfect place for the affluent Dragonborn.


Video:

[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ceHljHX0tu4]Watch video here![/url]   (Thank you hodilton for making it!)


Includes:

Kitchen 
Dining area
Living Room
Basement smithing area
Bathroom
Master bedroom
Study with enchanting and alchemy tables, and a safe
Weapons storage area
outside deck with views of solitude


No dlc's needed, Just updated Skyrim.


Enjoy!
author: Paul Millhouse
